description: Provides static methods for checking authentication status, retrieving user data, and performing role-based checks.

methods.name: check
methods.description: Checks if a user is currently logged in.

methods.name: user
methods.description: Retrieves the data of the currently logged-in user.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Retrieves the ID of the currently logged-in user.

methods.name: hasRole
methods.description: Checks if the logged-in user has a specific role.

methods.name: can
methods.description: Checks if the logged-in user has a specific permission. Currently, this is a simplified check that maps directly to roles.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user by clearing the session.
